item.title: Test simplest sign-in integration
item.description: Test simplest sign-in integration with a redirect sample app Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: This doc discusses how to get the sample apps up and running with the redirect solution. I was debating on putting in the Authentication section but felt it made more sense in a IAM or Okta Product Dev Newbie user flow Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer

item.title: Test more customizable sign-in integration
item.description: Test more customizable sign-in integration with an embedded widget app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Download and set up the SDK, Sign-In Widget, and sample apps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-common-download-setup-app/android/main/ Run the sample apps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-common-run-samples/android/main/ Embedded Okta Sign-In Widget fundamentals: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/embedded-siw/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.

item.title: Test the most complex sign-in integration
item.description: Test the most complex sign-in integration with an embedded SDK app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Download and set up the SDK, Sign-In Widget, and sample apps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-common-download-setup-app/android/main/ Run the sample apps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-common-run-samples/android/main/ Auth JS fundamentals: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/auth-js/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
